dmca.title: Earthroamer Attempts to Plow Down Copyrighted Description of SUV
dmca.body:
Fax
To:	Google, Inc
[Recipient] 
From: [Private]
Fax:	[Private]	
Fax:	[Private]
Phone:	
Phone: [Private]

Date:	3/16/2005	

Pages: 3
Subject: DMCA notification
Notes: Please provide acknowledgement of receipt.
March 16, 2005

Google, Inc.
Attn: [Recipient] 
[Address]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.earthroamer.com/main_truck/vehicles.html

2.	Search Query: earthroamer
3.	URL of Search Query: 
4.	http://www.google.com/search?q=earthroamer&hl=en&lr-&start=20&sa=N

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.cowboycadillac.com

Copyright infringement #1
If you do a Google search on "EarthRoamer," search result #28 is this link: http://www.cowboycadillac.com/4x4specs.htm  If you go to this link and view the HTML source, you will find the following copyrighted text from our EarthRoamer.com web site repeated 36 times: EarthRoamer Xpedition VehiclesXVs are the next step beyond traditional RVs offering capability,EarthRoamer XVs are compact, energy efficient, solar powered homes, built on a Ford F-450 truck chassis, and powered by a quiet, efficient and powerful turbo-diesel engine. EarthRoamer Xpedition Vehicles offer unprecedented versatility, style, quality, and ease of operation, along with a heavy dose of adrenaline

Copyright infringement #2
If you do a Google search on "EarthRoamer," search result #48 is this link: http://www.cowboycadillac.com/4x4motorhomes.htm  If you go to this link and view the HTML source, you will find the following copyrighted text from our EarthRoamer.com web site repeated 113 times: EarthRoamer Xpedition VehiclesXVs are the next step beyond traditional RVs offering capability,EarthRoamer XVs are compact, energy efficient, solar powered homes, built on a Ford F-450 truck chassis, and powered by a quiet, efficient and powerful turbo-diesel engine. EarthRoamer Xpedition Vehicles offer unprecedented versatility, style, quality, and ease ofoperation, along with a heavy dose of adrenaline
My Contact Information: [e-mail]
4.		Infringer's Contact Information: [Phone] Cowboy Cadillac Po [Address] Seabrook Tx. 77586 [e-mail]
5.		I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6.		I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[Sender], EarthRoamer.com
Phone: [Private]
Fax: [Private]
Email: [Private]
